tidbits.title: Ancient Archaeological Sites
tidbits.description: Saudi Arabia is home to several ancient archaeological sites, including Madain Saleh, a UNESCO World Heritage Site featuring elaborate Nabatean tombs akin to Petra in Jordan.

tidbits.title: Islamic Holy Sites
tidbits.description: The country hosts the Islamic holy cities of Mecca and Medina, attracting millions of pilgrims annually for Hajj and Umrah, significant religious pilgrimages.

tidbits.title: Vision 2030
tidbits.description: Saudi Arabia is pursuing Vision 2030, a plan aimed at diversifying its economy, reducing dependency on oil, and promoting social and cultural reforms.
